bottom_note:
Service Specifications:
- Professional setup includes complete unpacking, placement, and customer walkthrough
- Heavy item handling includes specialized equipment and additional safety measures
- Packing services categorized based on item value and fragility requirements
- Extended storage periods beyond 3-month term will incur additional monthly charges at quoted rate

Access and Logistics:
- Shared parking lot access accommodated with appropriate equipment positioning
- Multi-story stair carry charges applied for all 2nd and 3rd floor items
- Professional coordination with property management for parking access
- Delivery scheduling coordinated upon completion of restoration work

Quality Assurance:
- Final invoice may vary based on actual quantities and field conditions
- All fragile items receive enhanced protection protocols

items.name: Trip Fee - Pack Out
items.dec: Round trip to Public Storage Middlebrook Road(2.5 miles) including fuel and equipment transport

items.name: Professional Pack-Out Labor
items.dec: 4-person crew complete 3-story townhouse pack-out

items.name: Standard Item Packing
items.dec: Shoe case, chairs 6EA, small chair, basket, drawer, clothes rod, shelf 2EA, lamps, decor items, miscellaneous furniture

items.name: Fragile Item Packing
items.dec: Dishes 4BX, bathroom contents, wall hanging pictures 2EA, electronics, glassware, fragile household items

items.name: Premium Item Packing
items.dec: Sofa medium, sofa large, sofa desk 2EA, bed frame, dining table, specialty furniture

items.name: Box Packing - Standard
items.dec: Clothes boxes 14EA, bedding, pillows, packed contents, books, linens, general items

items.name: Box Packing - Premium Protection
items.dec: Dishes 4BX, kitchen items, fragile contents with specialized protection

items.name: Heavy Item Handling - Furniture
items.dec: Sofa medium, sofa large, bed frame, mattress, dining table, heavy appliances

items.name: Stair Carry Surcharge - Multi-Story
items.dec: All 2nd and 3rd floor items stair carry charge including additional household items

items.name: Trip Fee - Pack In
items.dec: Round trip delivery from storage facility with equipment

items.name: Professional Pack-In Labor
items.dec: 4-person crew complete delivery setup and placement all floors

items.name: Standard Item Unpacking
items.dec: Professional unpacking and placement of standard furniture items, lamps, decor

items.name: Fragile Item Unpacking
items.dec: Careful unpacking of dishes, bathroom contents, electronics, wall pictures, fragile items

items.name: Premium Item Setup
items.dec: Professional setup sofas, sofa desk, bed frame, dining table, specialty items

items.name: Box Unpacking - Standard
items.dec: Clothes boxes 14EA, bedding, pillows, books, linens, general items unpacking and placement

items.name: Box Unpacking - Premium
items.dec: Dishes 4BX, kitchen items, careful unpacking and placement

items.name: Heavy Item Setup
items.dec: Reassembly and positioning of sofas, bed frame, mattress, dining table, heavy appliances

items.name: Stair Delivery Setup - Multi-Story
items.dec: Multi-story delivery and placement including stair carry for all household items

items.name: Post-Delivery Cleanup
items.dec: Debris removal and final cleanup service

items.name: Climate Controlled Storage - Month 1
items.dec: Professional storage facility with Climate-controlled, security monitoring

items.name: Climate Controlled Storage - Month 2
items.dec: Continued storage second month

items.name: Climate Controlled Storage - Month 3
items.dec: Extended storage third month per project timeline
